channel.title: ~Project MimzScape~
channel.description:
[center][b][size=16pt][font=Batik Regular] MimzScape[/font] [/size][/b][/center]
[b]Hey wassup you guys! Well I'm currently working on a new server (my first one) and it's called MimzScape (because of my last name of course) and I just decided to share what it is with you all in the hopes that someone might like it and possibly give some suggestions or something...[/b]
[b]Well I promise, I'm not just talking out of my ass here when I say that this is going to be [u]one[/u] of the best servers available[/b]
[center][b][i]What MimzScape will contain[/i][/b][/center]
[center]
[ul][li]It will be challenging for skills and monsters[/li] [li]It will have good pking content[/li] [li]It will be neat and (somewhat) organized*[/li] [li]It will have quests that aren't a load of [b]shit[/b][/li] [li]It will also have clue scrolls[/li] [li]It will have an amazing selection of minigames**[/li] [li]It will have [b]ALL[/b], yes [b]ALL[/b], working skills[/li] [li]It will be user(player)-friendly[/li] [li]It will be [b]SAFE[/b] and [b]STABLE[/b][/li] [li]It will have skill guides[/li] [li]All Npcs will talk[/li] [li]It will support Clans/Teams/Gangs (whatever the fuck you want to call it)[/li] [li]It will have food timers[/li] [li]There will be [b]ABSOLUTELY NO[/b] bank pking[/li] [li]It will contain [b]EVERY[/b] form of magic (including Mod/Admin spells)[/li] [li]Staff will get their own minigame and they [b]MUST[/b] be nice to other players to get Mod/Admin[/li] [li]Sorry, but there are going to be [b]NO[/b] Co-Owners [/li] [li]It will be SYIPkPker protected[/li] [li]Godsword's will be a challenge to get[/li] [li]There are going to be [b]NO[/b] skillcape shops (you have to get to level 99 and then talk to the skill master)[/li] [li]It will have undercover Mods/Admins as well as normal Mods/Admins[/li] [li]It is going to look nice***[/li] [li]It is going to be fun for everyone to play[/li] [li]It is going to be a challenge for pking with the use of obstacles[/li] [li]Rage will have farcast as will Mage[/li] [li]It will have a grand exchange (basic)[/li] [li]Players pking with Clans/Teams/Gangs will (more than likely) use some sort of strategy (this will be pushed greatly)[/li] [li]Pkers will be able to use barricades to protect themselves[/li] [li]It will support player pets[/li] [li]It will have construction[/li] [li]It will have summoning[/li] [li]You will have to work for ancients and dragon[/li] [li]The only way to get Barrows armour is to complete the barrows minigame[/li] [li]The home area will be greatly edited using a huge ammount of deleteThatWall, deleteThatObject, replaceObject, and makeGlobalObject[/li] [li]It will have an [b]OPTIONAL[/b] tutorial island (you get bonus xp if you do it)[/li] [li]It will give a [b]LOT[/b] of help to new players[/li] [li]It will be close to real RuneScape in the sense of freedoms and a wide range of options[/li] [li]It will be shocking to new players[/li] [li]It will have correct GodSword emotes[/li] [li]It will have teleportation tablets[/li] [li]It will [b]NOT[/b] have teleports on the emote tabs[/li] [li]Teleports from the magic book will have to have runes[/li] [li]It will have the telegrab spell and telogether spell (possibly, this is probably going to be the last thing I work on)[/li] [li]Shops will [b]NOT[/b] be all jumbled up together in a huge shop orgy type thing... They will be spread out[/li] [li]Shop owners that have multiple choice options will have those options activated****[/li][/ul]
And so much more... [/center]
So... I just thought that I would tell you about my project and I don't have anyone to work with on it so I'm going to be by myself, if only someone could help me with all of this shit (hint), I might give credits to that person and possibly make them an Admin (since there are no Co-Owners)... If only...
Well anyway, for more information about my upcoming server you can go to [url=http://mimzscape.smfforfree3.com/]http://mimzscape.smfforfree3.com/[/url] and sign in and we can talk, I will also be adding information on these topics in the "MimzScape Development" section, So check that out.
(Extra Info)
* (More Organized) What I meant by more organized was that everything wouldn't be crushed together in a tiny home area and a fuck load of portals with annoying Npcs shouting "Shop Portal", "Minigame Portal", and all that other bullshit. It's not going to be confusing
** (More Minigames) This means what you think it means... more minigames, the reason I put this in the extra information section was to tell you the different types of minigames...
[u]Clan Wars[/u] A player has the option to join a clan with his friends and enter a designated portal for their clan... When they do this they then must find members from the other clans and kill them. Once they have done this, they must obtain the players ring and cape that they are given at the start of the game. Once they do this, they then have to exit through the Clan Wars exit portal with their cape in their inventory. Then they go to the Clan Wars chest and get 10k and +5 points for their clan (also when they kill another clan member they get +1 points for their clan)
[u]Hell Wars[/u] A player goes into the depths of "Hell" and must battle his way through the levels of "Hell" to reach the most valued item of the Underworld... The Unholy Book, then once the player has returned with the book, they give it to Evil Dave and he gives you Soul Points (Soul Points are then used to buy Holy or Unholy items)
[u]Fight Arena[/u] I'm sure most of you know what this is, so I'm not going to explain it
[u]Hand of the Gods[/u] A player is teleported to an empty grassland area that contains a few signifigant items with a task to perform. This task can be any number of things (I'm still working on this... So this isn't a major Minigame right now...)
And basically all of the other Minigames just modified to look cleaner
***(Looking Nice) This basically is what I said before about it being organized, but it also means that it's going to appeal to the eye. For example, you orginally had a place that looked dull and boring and how it had originally looked before, well now it looks "pretty" (lol, not meaning to be gay) and it means that I'm going to take the original home area, minigame area, pking area, quest area, and give a "makeover" like one of those home makeover shows with less people that sound like complete fags and dress in tight jeans.
****(Muliple Choice Npcs) Mainly I'm just going to explain what the multiple choice option is. Okay have you ever right clicked on an Npc and seen options such as "Talk to", "Buy", "Bank", or "Teleport"? Well I'm sure you have, so what I meant was that if one of those options is there i.e. "Talk", "Bank", Teleport", They are going to work. So if you see Aubry and you right click him and choose the "Teleport" option, you'll teleport the Rune Essence mine. Or say you want to choose the "Talk" option, He'll talk to you. The same goes for [b]ALL[/b] Npcs that are in the server. _______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Well, That's about it... I hope I don't have to do this alone (another hint)
So if you want to help me out you can visit my forum that I made for this project [url=http://mimzscape.smfforfree3.com/]http://mimzscape.smfforfree3.com/[/url]
00ryn00 (Mimz)

item.title: ~Project MimzScape~
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

[center][size=16pt][font=Batik Regular] MimzScape[/font] [/size][/center]

Hey wassup you guys! Well I’m currently working on a new server (my first one) and it’s called MimzScape (because of my last name of course) and I just decided to share what it is with you all in the hopes that someone might like it and possibly give some suggestions or something…

Well I promise, I’m not just talking out of my ass here when I say that this is going to be one of the best servers available

[center]What MimzScape will contain[/center]

[center]

[ul][li]It will be challenging for skills and monsters[/li]
[li]It will have good pking content[/li]
[li]It will be neat and (somewhat) organized*[/li]
[li]It will have quests that aren’t a load of shit[/li]
[li]It will also have clue scrolls[/li]
[li]It will have an amazing selection of minigames**[/li]
[li]It will have ALL, yes ALL, working skills[/li]
[li]It will be user(player)-friendly[/li]
[li]It will be SAFE and STABLE[/li]
[li]It will have skill guides[/li]
[li]All Npcs will talk[/li]
[li]It will support Clans/Teams/Gangs (whatever the fuck you want to call it)[/li]
[li]It will have food timers[/li]
[li]There will be ABSOLUTELY NO bank pking[/li]
[li]It will contain EVERY form of magic (including Mod/Admin spells)[/li]
[li]Staff will get their own minigame and they MUST be nice to other players to get Mod/Admin[/li]
[li]Sorry, but there are going to be NO Co-Owners [/li]
[li]It will be SYIPkPker protected[/li]
[li]Godsword’s will be a challenge to get[/li]
[li]There are going to be NO skillcape shops (you have to get to level 99 and then talk to the skill master)[/li]
[li]It will have undercover Mods/Admins as well as normal Mods/Admins[/li]
[li]It is going to look nice***[/li]
[li]It is going to be fun for everyone to play[/li]
[li]It is going to be a challenge for pking with the use of obstacles[/li]
[li]Rage will have farcast as will Mage[/li]
[li]It will have a grand exchange (basic)[/li]
[li]Players pking with Clans/Teams/Gangs will (more than likely) use some sort of strategy (this will be pushed greatly)[/li]
[li]Pkers will be able to use barricades to protect themselves[/li]
[li]It will support player pets[/li]
[li]It will have construction[/li]
[li]It will have summoning[/li]
[li]You will have to work for ancients and dragon[/li]
[li]The only way to get Barrows armour is to complete the barrows minigame[/li]
[li]The home area will be greatly edited using a huge ammount of deleteThatWall, deleteThatObject, replaceObject, and makeGlobalObject[/li]
[li]It will have an OPTIONAL tutorial island (you get bonus xp if you do it)[/li]
[li]It will give a LOT of help to new players[/li]
[li]It will be close to real RuneScape in the sense of freedoms and a wide range of options[/li]
[li]It will be shocking to new players[/li]
[li]It will have correct GodSword emotes[/li]
[li]It will have teleportation tablets[/li]
[li]It will NOT have teleports on the emote tabs[/li]
[li]Teleports from the magic book will have to have runes[/li]
[li]It will have the telegrab spell and telogether spell (possibly, this is probably going to be the last thing I work on)[/li]
[li]Shops will NOT be all jumbled up together in a huge shop orgy type thing… They will be spread out[/li]
[li]Shop owners that have multiple choice options will have those options activated****[/li][/ul]

And so much more…
[/center]

So… I just thought that I would tell you about my project and I don’t have anyone to work with on it so I’m going to be by myself, if only someone could help me with all of this shit (hint), I might give credits to that person and possibly make them an Admin (since there are no Co-Owners)… If only…

Well anyway, for more information about my upcoming server you can go to http://mimzscape.smfforfree3.com/ and sign in and we can talk, I will also be adding information on these topics in the “MimzScape Development” section, So check that out.

(Extra Info)

  • (More Organized)
    What I meant by more organized was that everything wouldn’t be crushed together in a tiny home area and a fuck load of portals with annoying Npcs shouting “Shop Portal”, “Minigame Portal”, and all that other bullshit. It’s not going to be confusing

** (More Minigames)
This means what you think it means… more minigames, the reason I put this in the extra information section was to tell you the different types of minigames…

Clan Wars
A player has the option to join a clan with his friends and enter a designated portal for their clan… When they do this they then must find members from the other clans and kill them. Once they have done this, they must obtain the players ring and cape that they are given at the start of the game. Once they do this, they then have to exit through the Clan Wars exit portal with their cape in their inventory. Then they go to the Clan Wars chest and get 10k and +5 points for their clan (also when they kill another clan member they get +1 points for their clan)

Hell Wars
A player goes into the depths of “Hell” and must battle his way through the levels of “Hell” to reach the most valued item of the Underworld… The Unholy Book, then once the player has returned with the book, they give it to Evil Dave and he gives you Soul Points (Soul Points are then used to buy Holy or Unholy items)

Fight Arena
I’m sure most of you know what this is, so I’m not going to explain it

Hand of the Gods
A player is teleported to an empty grassland area that contains a few signifigant items with a task to perform. This task can be any number of things (I’m still working on this… So this isn’t a major Minigame right now…)

And basically all of the other Minigames just modified to look cleaner

***(Looking Nice)
This basically is what I said before about it being organized, but it also means that it’s going to appeal to the eye. For example, you orginally had a place that looked dull and boring and how it had originally looked before, well now it looks “pretty” (lol, not meaning to be gay) and it means that I’m going to take the original home area, minigame area, pking area, quest area, and give a “makeover” like one of those home makeover shows with less people that sound like complete fags and dress in tight jeans.

****(Muliple Choice Npcs)
Mainly I’m just going to explain what the multiple choice option is. Okay have you ever right clicked on an Npc and seen options such as “Talk to”, “Buy”, “Bank”, or “Teleport”? Well I’m sure you have, so what I meant was that if one of those options is there i.e. “Talk”, “Bank”, Teleport", They are going to work. So if you see Aubry and you right click him and choose the “Teleport” option, you’ll teleport the Rune Essence mine. Or say you want to choose the “Talk” option, He’ll talk to you. The same goes for ALL Npcs that are in the server.

Well, That’s about it…
I hope I don’t have to do this alone (another hint)

So if you want to help me out you can visit my forum that I made for this project
http://mimzscape.smfforfree3.com/

00ryn00
(Mimz)

Read full topic
